pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Thoth doc: Dependency-free, lightweight docstring parser![Thoth image](Thoth.svg.png)## Installation```bashpip install thoth-doc```## Usage```python# code.pydef foo(bar: int, baz: str = "qux") -> None: """This is a docstring""" passclass Foo: """This is a class docstring""" def bar(self, bar: int, baz: str = "qux") -> None: """This is a method docstring""" pass``````pythonfrom thoth_doc import get_docstringdocstring = get_docstring("code.py", "foo") # find docstring of foo in code.pyprint(docstring) # "This is a docstring"docstring = get_docstring("code.py", "Foo") # find docstring of Foo class in code.pydocstring = get_docstring("code.py", "Foo.bar") # find docstring of Foo.bar method in code.py```## License[MIT License](LICENSE)
